alignCenter.description: The pop-up box is centered vertically and horizontally

autoFocus.description: Whether to focus the first focusable element by default only takes effect when focusLock is enabled.
autoFocus.description_zh: 是否默认聚焦第一个可聚焦元素，只在 focusLock 开启时生效。

closable.description: Whether to display the close button in the upper right corner
closable.description_zh: 是否显示右上角的关闭按钮

confirmLoading.description: Confirm that the button is loading

escToExit.description: Press the ESC key to close

focusLock.description: Whether to lock focus within a pop-up box
focusLock.description_zh: 是否将焦点锁定在弹出框内

mask.description: Whether or not to display a mask

maskClosable.description: Click to see if the mask can be turned off
maskClosable.description_zh: 点击蒙层是否可以关闭

mountOnEnter.description: Whether the DOM is rendered when the dialog is first opened
mountOnEnter.description_zh: 是否在初次打开对话框时才渲染 dom

simple.description: The style of the clean mode, with no dividing lines, and the bottom button is displayed in the center. By default, the pop-up window of the prompt type called by method will display the simple style. If this parameter is set to true, the close icon in the upper right corner is not displayed by default
simple.description_zh: 简洁模式的样式，没有分割线，底部按钮居中显示。默认通过方法调用的提示类型的弹窗会展示simple样式。设置为true时，默认不显示右上角关闭图标

unmountOnExit.description: Whether or not to destroy the DOM structure after hiding
unmountOnExit.description_zh: 是否在隐藏之后销毁DOM结构

:visible.description: Whether the pop-up box is visible

:closeIcon.description: Customize the close button node in the upper right corner
:closeIcon.description_zh: 自定义右上角的关闭按钮节点

title.description: The title of the pop-up box

cancelButtonProps.description: Cancel the props of the button

:okButtonProps.description: Confirm the props of the button

wrapClassName.description: The pop-up box is the outer DOM class name
wrapClassName.description_zh: 弹出框外层 dom 类名

:afterClose.description: The callback after the pop-up box is closed

:afterOpen.description: The callback after the pop-up box is opened

:footer.description: Custom footer, null is passed in and not displayed
:footer.description_zh: 自定义页脚，传入 null 则不显示

:getChildrenPopupContainer.description: The pop-up box in the dialog box, such as Select Tooltip, is mounted in the dialog box by default.
:getChildrenPopupContainer.description_zh: 对话框里的弹出框 Select Tooltip 等挂载的容器，默认挂载在对话框内。

:getPopupContainer.description: Specify the parent node to which the pop-up box is mounted
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 指定弹出框挂载的父节点

events.name: onOk
events.description: Click the callback of the Confirm button

events.name: onCancel
events.description: Close the callback for the pop-up box
